item.title: Gender Classfication model With 92.68% accuracy
item.description: You can get the data from Kaggle Importing Needed Lib import os from tensorflow.keras import layers from tensorflow.keras import Model from tensorflow.keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator import tensorflow as tf import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import PIL Getting the Data Ready train_datagen = ImageDataGenerator(rescale = 1./255, rotation_range=40, width_shift_range=0.2, height_shift_range=0.2, shear_range=0.2, zoom_range=0.2, horizontal_flip=True, fill_mode='nearest') test_datagen = ImageDataGenerator( rescale = 1.0/255) train_generator = train_datagen.flow_from_directory('Gender/Train', batch_size =256 , class_mode = 'binary', target_size = (64, 64)) validation_generator = test_datagen.
